text: 21 Tower Hamlets Joint Strategic Needs Assessment: Strategic Planning and Health (2016) 22 London Atmospheric Emissions Inventory (LAEI) (GLA, 2019) 23 LBTH Air Quality Action Plan (AQAP) 2022-27 24 Public Health Outcomes Framework Data, OHID (2021) 25 LBTH Air Quality Action Plan (AQAP) 2022-27 Tower Hamlets Local Plan 139 CLEAN AND GREEN FUTURE guidance, to demonstrate how benefits to local air quality have been maximised, and how measures to minimise pollution exposure will be implemented. Certain development proposals outside of AQFAs may also be required to submit an Air Quality Positive statement, this will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis by the councilâ€™s Air Quality team. 13.118 All other development proposals will be required to achieve the air quality neutral benchmarks as set out in the London Plan.
